name: 13Feet
description:
13Feet is a simple tool that bypasses paywalls by using Google's cache to access articles, 
providing a clean reading experience without any ads or popups.

deployment.justification: Simple Python application that can be deployed using standard web servers like nginx. Minimal configuration required and straightforward setup process.

name: 2FAuth
description: 2FAuth is a web-based self-hosted two-factor authentication (2FA) manager that allows you to securely store and manage your 2FA tokens in one place.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker or traditional web server setup. Comes with clear documentation and straightforward configuration options.

name: Activepieces
description: Activepieces is an open-source, no-code business automation platform that connects different services and applications to automate workflows. It's a self-hosted alternative to Zapier and other automation tools.

deployment.justification: Docker-based deployment with multiple containers including database and queue workers. Requires proper configuration of environment variables and optional external services for production use.

name: AdGuard Home
description: AdGuard Home is a network-wide DNS server that blocks ads, trackers, and malicious domains while providing detailed analytics and customizable filtering rules.

deployment.justification: Single binary deployment with web-based setup wizard. Cross-platform compatibility and Docker support make installation straightforward on various systems.

name: Akaunting
description: Akaunting is a free online accounting software designed for small businesses and freelancers, providing invoicing, expense tracking, and financial reporting.

deployment.justification: Standard web application deployment requiring PHP, web server, and database. Installation wizard simplifies setup but proper configuration needed for production use.

name: ArchiveBox
description: ArchiveBox is an open-source, self-hosted web archiving solution that lets you create HTML and screenshot archives of websites from your bookmarks, browsing history, RSS feeds, or other sources.

deployment.justification: Python application with multiple dependencies for different archive formats. Requires proper configuration of external tools like Chrome/Chromium for screenshots. Docker deployment simplifies setup.

name: Bitwarden
description:
Bitwarden is an open-source password management solution that helps you store, 
generate, and secure your passwords across all devices and platforms.

deployment.justification: Requires setting up multiple components including web server, database, and supporting services. The Docker deployment simplifies this, but proper configuration for security and high availability requires careful planning and technical knowledge.

name: BookStack
description: BookStack is a self-hosted platform for organizing and storing information in a book-like structure, perfect for documentation, wikis, and knowledge management.

deployment.justification: Requires web server, PHP, and MySQL/MariaDB setup. Well-documented installation process with Docker options available.

name: Crater
description: Crater is a web and mobile application for tracking expenses and payments, perfect for freelancers and small businesses to manage their invoicing and financial operations.

deployment.justification: Web application requiring PHP environment and database setup. Mobile app provides additional complexity but Docker deployment simplifies installation process.

name: Dashy
description: Dashy is a highly customizable dashboard for self-hosted services and homelab management, featuring a beautiful interface and powerful configuration options.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with YAML configuration. No database required and easy customization through config files.

name: Docker Registry
description: Docker Registry is the official storage and distribution service for Docker images, providing a simple and scalable way to store and share container images privately.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker container deployment with minimal configuration. Basic setup works out of the box, with optional advanced features for production use.

name: Drone CI
description: Drone is a modern continuous integration platform built on container technology that automates software testing and deployment with simple YAML configuration.

deployment.justification: Straightforward Docker deployment but requires proper runner configuration and integration with version control systems. Documentation is comprehensive.

name: Duplicati
description: Duplicati is a backup client that securely stores encrypted, incremental, compressed backups on cloud storage services and remote file servers.

deployment.justification: Simple installation with cross-platform support. Web-based configuration interface makes setup straightforward with minimal technical knowledge required.

name: Emby
description: Emby is a personal media server that organizes your media collection and streams it to any device with advanced features for families and media enthusiasts.

deployment.justification: Straightforward installation with Docker support and comprehensive documentation. Setup wizard guides through initial configuration.

name: Firefly III
description:
Firefly III is a modern, self-hosted personal finance manager that helps you track 
expenses, income, budgets and manage your financial life.

deployment.justification: Offers a well-documented Docker setup that requires minimal configuration. The installer handles database setup, and there's an option to use a pre-configured Docker Compose file that sets up the application and all required dependencies in one step.

name: FreshRSS
description: FreshRSS is a self-hosted RSS feed aggregator that offers a clean interface, powerful features, and extensive customization for managing your news and content feeds.

deployment.justification: Simple PHP application with Docker support. Web-based setup wizard and minimal configuration required.

name: Ghost
description: Ghost is a modern, open-source content management system and blogging platform designed for professional publishing. It offers a clean writing experience, powerful SEO tools, and built-in membership and subscription features.

deployment.justification: Node.js application requiring proper server configuration, database setup, and SSL certificates. Production deployment benefits from understanding of Node.js hosting and performance optimization.

name: Gitea
description:
Gitea is a painless self-hosted Git service that provides a lightweight, 
fast and customizable alternative to GitHub and GitLab.

deployment.justification: Distributed as a single binary with minimal dependencies, has Docker support, and requires basic configuration. No complex database setup needed as it works with SQLite out of the box.

name: GitLab
description: GitLab is a complete DevOps platform that provides Git repository management, CI/CD pipelines, issue tracking, and collaboration tools in a single application.

deployment.justification: Complex installation requiring significant resources, database setup, and careful configuration. Multiple components need coordination for optimal performance.

name: Google Container Registry
description: Harbor is an open-source container registry that secures artifacts with role-based access control, scans images for vulnerabilities, and signs images as trusted.

name: Grafana
description: Grafana is an open-source observability platform for monitoring and analyzing metrics, logs, and traces with beautiful, customizable dashboards and alerting capabilities.

deployment.justification: Straightforward installation but requires proper data source configuration. Advanced features like alerting and authentication need additional setup.

name: Harbor
description: Harbor is an open-source container registry that secures artifacts with role-based access control, scans images for vulnerabilities, and signs images as trusted.

deployment.justification: Requires proper SSL configuration, database setup, and integration with authentication systems. Docker Compose deployment simplifies setup but production needs careful planning.

name: Headscale
description: Headscale is an open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server that allows you to build and manage your own private network.

deployment.justification: Requires a web server setup (Go, PostgreSQL), has specific server requirements for optimal performance, and needs occasional maintenance for updates and database optimization.

name: Healthchecks
description: Healthchecks is a simple and effective monitoring service that listens for pings from your services and sends alerts when pings are late, helping you monitor cron jobs, scheduled tasks, and service uptime.

deployment.justification: Django application with straightforward setup and minimal dependencies. Well-documented deployment process with Docker support and simple database requirements.

name: Home Assistant
description:
Home Assistant is an open-source home automation platform that puts local control 
and privacy first, with a powerful integration ecosystem for smart home devices.

deployment.justification: While Home Assistant OS and supervised installations are straightforward, achieving optimal functionality often requires additional configuration for integrations, networking setup for devices, and occasional troubleshooting for complex automations.

name: Immich
description:
Immich is a high-performance, self-hosted photo and video backup solution 
designed as an alternative to Google Photos and Apple Photos.

deployment.justification: Installation is streamlined with Docker Compose, which sets up all required components automatically. A detailed getting started guide walks users through the simple setup process, and the web interface provides intuitive configuration options after installation.

name: Invoice Ninja
description: Invoice Ninja is a powerful invoicing and billing platform that helps businesses create professional invoices, track payments, and manage client relationships.

deployment.justification: Requires web server, PHP, and database setup. Docker deployment available but needs proper configuration for email, payments, and security features.

name: Jellyfin
description:
Jellyfin is a free and open source media server that puts you in control of 
managing and streaming your media collection.

deployment.justification: Offers simple installation options including Docker, package managers, and pre-built binaries. Setup wizard guides users through initial configuration, and media library scanning is automated.

name: Jellyseerr
description: Jellyseerr is a request management and media discovery tool for Jellyfin and Emby media servers, allowing users to request movies and TV shows with approval workflows.

deployment.justification: Requires integration with media servers and download clients. Configuration involves multiple services but is well-documented with Docker support.

name: Joplin Server
description: Joplin Server is a self-hosted synchronization server for Joplin, the open-source note-taking application, providing secure note synchronization across devices.

deployment.justification: Requires PostgreSQL database setup and proper configuration. Docker deployment available but needs environment configuration for optimal performance.

name: Mastodon
description: Mastodon is a decentralized social media platform that provides Twitter-like microblogging with federation, privacy controls, and community-focused moderation.

deployment.justification: Complex deployment requiring PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, object storage, and email configuration. Resource-intensive with significant maintenance overhead.

name: Matomo
description:
Matomo is a powerful open source web analytics platform that gives you 
complete data ownership and privacy compliance without compromising on features.

deployment.justification: Requires a web server setup (PHP, MySQL/MariaDB), has specific server requirements for optimal performance, and needs occasional maintenance for updates and database optimization.

name: Matrix Synapse
description: Matrix Synapse is the reference homeserver implementation for the Matrix protocol, providing decentralized real-time communication with end-to-end encryption.

deployment.justification: Complex setup requiring database configuration, federation setup, and proper SSL certificates. Performance tuning and security hardening require expertise.

name: Mattermost
description: Mattermost is an open-source team collaboration platform that provides secure messaging, file sharing, and workflow automation for enterprises and development teams.

deployment.justification: Straightforward installation with Docker support, but requires database setup and proper configuration for enterprise features and high availability.

name: Metabase
description: Metabase is an open-source business intelligence and data visualization platform that makes it easy for everyone in your company to ask questions and learn from data, regardless of technical skill level.

deployment.justification: Java-based application with straightforward setup. Requires database configuration and proper resource allocation. Docker deployment is well-documented but may need tuning for production use.

name: MLflow
description: MLflow is an open-source platform for managing machine learning lifecycles, including experimentation, reproducibility, deployment, and model registry.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment and database setup for tracking server. Docker deployment available but proper configuration needed for production use with authentication and storage backends.

name: n8n
description:
n8n is an extendable workflow automation tool that allows you to connect 
various services and applications to automate tasks without coding.

deployment.justification: Can be installed with npm in one command, has an official Docker image, and works with SQLite by default requiring no external database. Initial setup is straightforward with minimal configuration needed to start building workflows.

selfHosted.name: Docker
selfHosted.description: Official Docker image available for easy containerized deployment

selfHosted.name: NPM
selfHosted.description: Direct installation via npm for Node.js environments

selfHosted.name: Docker Compose
selfHosted.description: Deploy n8n to any Docker Compose environment with manifest files.

selfHosted.name: Kubernetes
selfHosted.description: Deploy n8n to any Kubernetes cluster with manifest files.

managed.name: n8n Cloud
managed.description: Official cloud hosting solution with managed infrastructure

name: Nextcloud
description:
Nextcloud offers on-premises file sync, sharing and collaboration 
platform with advanced security and privacy features.

name: Outline
description: Outline is a team knowledge base and wiki that combines the best of Google Docs and Notion with a focus on speed, collaboration, and elegant design.

deployment.justification: Requires PostgreSQL, Redis, and S3-compatible storage setup. OAuth configuration needed for authentication. Docker deployment available but needs proper environment configuration.

name: Owncast
description: Owncast is a self-hosted live streaming platform that provides complete control over your streaming experience, offering an alternative to Twitch and YouTube Live.

deployment.justification: Requires streaming software setup and network configuration for optimal performance. Simple binary deployment but streaming workflow needs planning.

name: pfSense
description: pfSense is an open-source firewall and router platform based on FreeBSD that provides enterprise-grade security, VPN, and network management capabilities.

deployment.justification: Complex network appliance requiring dedicated hardware or virtualization. Network configuration, firewall rules, and VPN setup require significant networking knowledge.

name: Pi-hole
description: Pi-hole is a network-level advertisement and internet tracker blocking application that acts as a DNS sinkhole to protect your entire network from unwanted content.

deployment.justification: Simple one-line installation script works on most Linux distributions. Raspberry Pi optimized but runs on various hardware with minimal configuration.

name: Plausible Analytics
description: Plausible Analytics is a simple, lightweight (< 1 KB), and privacy-friendly web analytics tool. It provides essential insights about your website visitors without violating their privacy or compromising on performance.

deployment.justification: Requires Elixir/Phoenix environment setup and PostgreSQL database. Docker deployment simplifies installation but still requires proper configuration for production use.

name: Plex Media Server
description: Plex is a powerful media server that organizes your movies, TV shows, music, and photos, streaming them to any device with a beautiful, easy-to-use interface.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with automatic media detection and organization. Well-documented setup process with extensive community support.

name: Portainer
description: Portainer is a lightweight management UI for Docker, Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, and ACI that simplifies container management through an intuitive web interface.

deployment.justification: Extremely simple deployment as a single Docker container. No complex configuration required, connects automatically to Docker daemon.

name: PostHog
description: PostHog is an all-in-one product analytics platform that combines product analytics, session recording, feature flags, A/B testing, and user surveys in a single, self-hostable solution.

deployment.justification: Complex application requiring multiple services including PostgreSQL, Redis, ClickHouse, and message queues. Production deployment requires careful configuration of data processing pipelines and monitoring.

name: Prometheus
description: Prometheus is an open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit with a dimensional data model, powerful query language, and efficient time series database.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of metrics collection, service discovery configuration, and PromQL. Setting up comprehensive monitoring needs careful planning of scrape targets and retention policies.

name: Radarr
description: Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users that can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new movies and interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them.

deployment.justification: Similar to Sonarr, Radarr provides multiple installation methods including Docker containers and native packages. Setup is straightforward through the web interface with an initial configuration wizard and broad support for popular download clients.

name: Restic
description: Restic is a modern backup program that provides fast, secure, and efficient backups with deduplication, encryption, and verification across multiple storage backends.

deployment.justification: Single binary deployment with no dependencies. Command-line interface is well-documented and straightforward for both basic and advanced usage.

name: Rocket.Chat
description: Rocket.Chat is an open-source team communication platform that provides messaging, video conferencing, and collaboration tools with extensive customization options.

deployment.justification: Docker deployment available with good documentation. Requires MongoDB setup and proper configuration for scalability and advanced features.

name: Sonarr
description:
Sonarr is a smart PVR for newsgroup and bittorrent users that automatically 
downloads and organizes your TV shows.

deployment.justification: Offers installation options for all major platforms including Docker, package managers, and standalone binaries. The web interface handles most configuration with a setup wizard, and many popular download clients are supported out of the box.

name: Standard Notes Server
description: Standard Notes Server is a self-hosted backend for the Standard Notes application, providing encrypted note-taking with complete privacy and data ownership.

deployment.justification: Requires database setup (MySQL/MariaDB) and Redis. Docker deployment available with comprehensive documentation, but proper configuration needed for production use.

name: Apache Superset
description: Apache Superset is a modern data exploration and visualization platform that enables users to create interactive dashboards and perform ad-hoc analysis with a rich set of visualizations and an intuitive interface.

deployment.justification: Complex Python application requiring careful configuration of multiple components including Redis, database, and web server. Production deployment requires understanding of security, caching, and performance optimization.

name: Tautulli
description: Tautulli is a monitoring and analytics application for Plex Media Server that provides detailed statistics, notifications, and user activity tracking.

deployment.justification: Simple installation process with Docker support. Connects easily to existing Plex server with minimal configuration required.

name: Umami
description: Umami is a simple, fast, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics. It provides essential website analytics without cookies, tracking, or compromising visitor privacy.

deployment.justification: Simple Node.js application with straightforward setup. Supports multiple databases and has excellent Docker support for quick deployment.

name: UniFi Network Application
description: The UniFi Network Application is a powerful network management platform for UniFi devices, providing centralized configuration, monitoring, and control of enterprise networking equipment.

deployment.justification: Requires Java runtime and MongoDB database. Docker deployment available but needs proper configuration for device discovery and SSL certificates.

name: Uptime Kuma
description: Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted website monitoring tool that provides real-time monitoring for websites, APIs, and services with beautiful dashboards and instant notifications.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with web-based configuration. No complex setup required and includes built-in database.

name: UrBackup
description: UrBackup is an easy-to-setup open-source client/server backup system with web interface that provides automated file and image backups for Windows, Linux, and macOS.

deployment.justification: Server setup requires database configuration and network planning. Client deployment is straightforward, but proper configuration for enterprise environments needs careful planning.

name: Vaultwarden
description: Vaultwarden is an unofficial, lightweight Bitwarden server implementation written in Rust, perfect for self-hosting password management with full client compatibility.

deployment.justification: Single Docker container deployment with minimal resource requirements. Simple configuration and automatic database setup.

name: Wallabag
description: Wallabag is a self-hosted read-later application that allows you to save articles and web pages to read them later with improved readability, offline access, and powerful organization features.

deployment.justification: PHP web application requiring web server configuration and database setup. Multiple configuration options available but requires proper server environment setup for production use.

name: Watchtower
description: Watchtower is a container-based solution for automating Docker container base image updates, ensuring your containerized applications stay current with security patches and updates.

deployment.justification: Single container deployment with minimal configuration. Works out of the box with sensible defaults and optional fine-tuning.

name: Wiki.js
description: Wiki.js is a modern, lightweight wiki platform built with Node.js that offers powerful editing, beautiful themes, and Git-based storage for collaborative knowledge management.

deployment.justification: Requires database setup and Node.js environment. Docker deployment available but configuration can be complex for advanced features.
